title: Incorrect thread safety in BatchSignatureVerifier
body:
### Description
`BatchSignatureVerifier` stores jobs to be completed in an `ArrayList` without synchronisation but it's `verify` method is called from a parallel stream in `BlockProcessorUtil.verify_attestations`.  

I've seen two different exceptions result from this.
